questions: When have you stepped into the unknown without fear?

When have you surprised yourself with your capability?
What does your intuition tell you about a decision you’ve been avoiding?
When have you felt guided by something unseen?
What do you keep hidden, even from yourself?
What does nurturing mean to you, and who receives it?
What kind of beauty or comfort do you create around you?
How do you care for something that grows slowly?
What rules have you created for yourself?
When do you feel most in control—and is that good?
How do you respond to challenges to your authority?
What tradition do you follow, and why?
Where do you turn when you seek meaning?
How do you question or uphold your beliefs?
When did you last choose one path over another?
What does commitment mean to you?
How do you handle internal contradictions?
What drives you forward even in chaos?
How do you take control when forces conflict?
What is your current victory—and what did it cost?
What does strength look like when no one is watching?
How do you hold power with gentleness?
When have you faced something that scared you?
When did solitude teach you something important?
What truth have you found only by stepping back?
How do you know when it’s time to withdraw?
What pattern keeps repeating in your life?
How do you handle events beyond your control?
What has luck given—or taken—from you?
What decision are you accountable for?
When have you had to accept consequences?
What truth are you avoiding?
What must you give up to move forward?
When have you chosen stillness instead of action?
What happens when you see from another angle?
What part of your past must you let go?
What is dying in your world to make space for something new?
When have you grown from loss?
What would balance look like in your current situation?
What are you overindulging or denying?
Where can you be more patient?
What keeps you stuck that you pretend you control?
What desire do you fear owning?
When have you given your power away?
What truth shattered something you built?
How do you rebuild after loss?
What belief did you lose faith in—and what replaced it?
What do you still hope for, despite setbacks?
Where do you find light when it’s darkest?
What restores you?
What fears are you hiding from yourself?
What do your dreams try to tell you?
Where do you mistrust your own perception?
What truth fills you with joy?
When do you feel fully seen?
What deserves celebration right now?
What truth about yourself can no longer be ignored?
When have you answered a call no one else heard?
What would it mean to be forgiven?
What have you brought to completion?
Where do you feel whole?
What is your part in something greater?
